sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { getTasks } from '../features/task/taskSlice' const AdminDashboard = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const [tasks, useTask] = useState() const [ deadline, setDeadline] = useState() const { task } = useSelector(state => state.task) useEffect(() => { dispatch(getTasks()) }, []) return (
setTask(e.target.value)} type="text" className="block w-full px-4 py-2 mt-2 text-purple-700 bg-white border rounded-md focus:border-purple-400 focus:ring-purple-300 focus:outline-none focus:ring focus:ring-opacity-40" />
setDeadline(e.target.value)} type="email" className="block w-full px-4 py-2 mt-2 text-purple-700 bg-white border rounded-md focus:border-purple-400 focus:ring-purple-300 focus:outline-none focus:ring focus:ring-opacity-40" />
{task?.map((tas) => { return ( ) })}
Task Deadline Status
{tas?.task} { tas?.deadline} {tas?.status }
) } export default AdminDashboard
